You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &cire;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&cirE;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/29c3/index.htm U+029C3].
  * `&cire;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2257/index.htm U+02257].
